strapiPost.title: Unofficial Harry Potter Fan Convention Returning To Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
After two years, the region’s favorite unofficial Harry Potter fan conversation is returning to Fayetteville! 

  • A magical weekend: The Wizard Way of the Ozarks (formerly DiaCON Alley of the Ozarks) is back and set to be this coming weekend, full of entertainers, live creatures, and all things Harry Potter for your enjoyment. There will be a “merchant alley” of artisans displaying handcrafted, nerdy wares, a magical item scavenger hunt, wand dueling, a wizard-themed escape room, and so much more. 
  • Logistics: The convention will be March 19-20 at the Fayetteville Town Center 10a-5p both days. Tickets start at $25 and proceeds above operating costs will be donated to Asbell Elementary. 

For more details and information, click HERE.
